body.name: KingSpec 1TB M.2 2242 PCIe 4.0 SSD - Read Speed up to 7400MB/s, NVMe Internal SSD 3D Gen4 NAND Flash, M2 for Laptop Desktop
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 15 hrs 15 mins
features: Blazing Fast Performance: Harness the power of PCIe 4.0 with speeds of up to 7200MB/s for lightning-fast data access, boosting your system's performance.
Sleek and Protable Design: The compact M.2 2242 form factor is perfect for laptops, ultrabooks and compact devices, providing ample storage without the bulk.
Data Security at Its Best: Advanced bad sector management ensures the safety and integrity of your data, safeguarding against loss and corruption.
Built to Last: Exceptional durability means this M2 SSD maintains peak performance even with prolonged use, ensuring long-term reliability.
Customer Support: Backed with 3-year limited warranty and lifetime technical support. 24/7 tech support team is always ready to assist you, ensuring a worry-free shopping experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2x faster than PCIe 3.0 SSD 2242 Blazing Fast Sequential Read/Write Speed Elevate your digital experience with our PCIe 4.0 2242 SSD, boasting speeds over 2x faster than PCIe 3.0 at up to 7200MB/s for read and 6600MB/s for write. Whether you're a gamer, creative pro, or handling big data, our SSD has you covered. Unlock the future of speed today!

Faster Startup, Quick Loading Next-Level Stabilized Performance Experience next-level performance and data protection with our PCIe 4.0 2242 SSD. With support for wear leveling, LDPC (Low-Density Parity-Check) error correction, TRIM support, S.M.A.R.T monitoring, and robust data protection features, our SSD is your ultimate solution for high-speed storage needs.

Graphene Heatsink Good Heat Dissipation PCIe 4.0 2242 SSD with graphene thermal pads for efficient heat dissipation, delivering excellent cooling performance, ensuring stable operation without any speed degradation during use.

Why is the SSD not recognized after installation? When you use SSD for the first time, you need to format and partition it first. You can use "Disk Management Tool" to format and partition the SSD and then use it in "Windows Explorer". Why is the product capacity shown on my computer not 1TB or 2TB? Because the manufacturer's calculation method is 1TB=1000MB=1,000,000KB=1,000,000,000B, while the computer system's calculation method is 1TB=1024MB=1024*1024KB=1024*1024*1024B, so the capacity is 1TB=(1000*1000*1000)/(1024* 1024*1024)TB≈0.93TB. Why does the KingSpec XG7000 NVMe Gen 4x4 SSD not reach the tested speed of 7200MB/s? The nominal speed is tested when connected to the PCIe Gen 4x4 interface. If connected to PCIe Gen 3x4 interface, the speed will be limited to around 3500MB/s. If tested in an SSD chassis, the speed will be limited by the chassis. Can the KingSpec XG7000 NVMe Gen 4x4 SSD 2242 support Legion go? NO, the KingSpec XG7000 NVMe Gen 4x4 SSD 2242 uses double-sided modules and cannot be installed into Legion Go because Legion Go requires single-sided modules.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product works with the steam deck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good NVME M.2 Drive
reviews.reviewText: My test environment: New laptop with a 12th Gen i5 processor and a USB3.2-G2 c port…and an external enclosure.In full disclosure, I have not installed the SSD directly into an onboard Gen3 PCIE port yet to prove it faster than the enclosure (and the USB 3.2G2 c connection), so my test lacks in that regard. I’ll update this review if/when I do. Regardless, the SSD claims 3.4 GB/s speed, the enclosure I have claims 10Gb/s (1.25GB/s) speed as does the USB 3.2G2 c port. My results 1GB/s (8Gb/s). Plenty fast for my needs as a external drive, but my SSD enclosure/USB is likely the limiting factor.You will likely fare better price-per-GB with the larger 2280 form factor if you can install it in your system, but the smaller 2242 drive may be required for certain smaller devices (e.g. mini-PCs).Bottom Line:Good NVME M.2 Drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good drives but seem mis-labeled got 2280 NOT 2242 like ordered.
reviews.reviewText: The drives work great, but I specifically ordered 2242 for a reason. But both drives I ordered where 2280 size, both labels did have 2242 on them so my guess is they got mis-labeled at some point. Not sure if that's a amazon issue or seller issue. In the end made them work but knocking off a few stars since I did not get what I originally wanted.Edit:The Seller has reached out and is working on making things right, so adding a star for customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fast, does not work with xbox
reviews.reviewText: This drive is tiny and fast. make a very compact portable sdd, very fast too.I got it to try to fit it in my Xbox Series S but it is not compatible, I already new that so no complains, I just hope some day it fits.So far I have not had any issues or incompatibilities with this drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this product to install in a small Linux server. The product is capable of very high read and write speeds. My favorite thing about the product is the form factor of the drive allowing it to fit into smaller builds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for a 2230 drive
reviews.reviewText: The 2230 form factor is for small devices such as the SteamDeck, and small laptops. Before you even consider this item make sure that your intended device is "M" key and supports 2230. These are even smaller than the small 2240 drives that have sparse support to begin with.Being an "M" key, these are strictly NVMe devices. This limits your device/enclosure compatibility. That said, these are special purpose drives. I'm not going to post benchmarks because I cannot test this one at full speed. I did install it on an older laptop and it has made a huge performance difference above the OEM provided drive.I did not read the fine print, but the 15 year warranty will likely outlive the device you install this to. I have purchased other KingSpec 3D NAND devices previously and they have been running 24/7 for years with no issues. I have confidence in them among the budget brands. You can find other brands cheaper, but this is a brand I trust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well. It was easy to install and was a nice quick upgrade. Works as expected and pretty quick. While it’s not the cheapest, there are several that are even more expensive than this one so I think it’s a OK price for what it is overall happy with the upgrade it allowed me to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No good for Legion Go
reviews.reviewText: I tried this in my Legion go, and in my laptop drive will not detect.

Funciona realmente bien, a muy buenas velocidades. En la Steam Deck no es complicado ponerla pero lleva un rato y hay que seguir un video tutorial de los muchos que hay. He aumentado la capacidad de mi Deck de 256gb a 1TB. Ahora sí que sí. Y mayor rendimiento. Os la recomiendo si estais dudando.
Ottima memoria, montata nello steam deck di mio figlio, nessun problema, subito riconosciuta.
Venditore affidabile e professionale con ottimi prodotti, lo conisglio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently took a gamble on an NVMe drive that seemed almost too good to be true in terms of pricing. Skepticism aside, I decided to give it a shot, and boy, am I glad I did! The drive not only turned out to be real, but it exceeded my expectations.Firstly, the packaging was solid and well-protected, ensuring the NVMe drive arrived in pristine condition. It's always a relief when you order a tech component, and it's delivered with care.Installation was a breeze. I was a bit apprehensive about compatibility, especially since I was installing it on my 64GB Steam Deck. However, the NVMe drive slid into place seamlessly, and within minutes, I had expanded my storage to a whopping 1TB. Talk about a game-changer!The speed and performance of this drive are remarkable. Games load faster, and the increased storage space allows me to carry an extensive library on my Steam Deck without worrying about running out of room. It's like having a portable gaming powerhouse in the palm of my hands.What truly sets this NVMe drive apart is its unbeatable price. While I initially questioned whether it was too good to be true, the product delivered on all fronts. It's a testament to the fact that quality tech doesn't always have to come with a hefty price tag.In conclusion, if you're in need of additional storage for your gaming setup and come across this NVMe drive, don't hesitate. It's a fantastic investment that won't break the bank. My Steam Deck has never been happier, and neither have I. Kudos to the makers of this incredible product!
caclidad precio va genial. lo puse hace unos dias en Steam Deck y a priori todo perfecto. A ver si tiene buena durabilidad y no da problemas, pero de momento todo genial
